item.title: New preprint! The Role of White Matter Disconnection in the Symptoms Relating to the Anarchic Hand Syndrome: A Single Case Study.
item.author: Author
item.description:
A new preprint was released March $18^{th}, 2021$!

A single-case study with complete lesional and tractography analysis, and additional review of the literature on a patient with Anarchic Hand.

item.title: A new article is out: Anosognosia for theory of mind deficits: A single case study and a review of the literature
item.author: Author
item.description: Dear all, it is with extreme plaseure that I am announcing the new article of Valentina Pacella (that I am co-authoring). Pacella, V., Scandola, M., Beccherle, M., Bulgarelli, C., Avesani, R., Carbognin, G., Agostini, G., Thiebaut de Schotten, M., & Moro, V. (2020). Anosognosia for theory of mind deficits: A single case study and a review of the literature. Neuropsychologia, 148. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.neuropsychologia.2020.107641 Abstract: Being aware of one’s own ability to interact socially is crucial to everyday life.
